text: Renato Raffaele Martino (23 November 1932 - 28 October 2024) was an Italian prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was a cardinal from 2003 until his death. He was the longest serving Cardinal Deacon, the Cardinal Protodeacon, to June 2014 to October 2024. Martino died in Rome, Italy on 28 October 2024, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:Italian cardinals Category:1932 births Category:2024 deaths
title: Renato Martino
